attributes.review: You would think that since this is the presidents app it would work perfectly!!! There are so many glitches and it’s over all such a hard app to use. I recommend you just take down the whole app 😡😡.
attributes.title: So many glitches!!!!

attributes.review: So I downloaded the app and it gave me a  horrible virus that sold all of my information to the black market and wiped my phone. But that’s not it, when I opened it showed me animal pornography. The app also came in my house and flashed my mom, it also killed a whole country.🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮 This app is sooo bad please don’t download this.
attributes.title: THE WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This app is super buggy and only works if you are white, racist, misogynistic, homophobic, sexist, a registered republican, and voted for Trump in 2016 and plan to again. See I am only white so that’s why it worked a little, but because I possessed none of the other qualities, it would not let me use. Uninstalled!!
attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!

attributes.review: I opened the app with high hopes because I knew our stunning beautiful centaur wouldn’t let us down!! But I was shocked as soon as I opened it, it asked for my phone number😦🤬 maybe get to know me and ask me out first😣😠 I am so distraught over this! Our half horse half human king as let us down😣😔😔
attributes.title: Baffled

attributes.review: I logged into register and it completely glitches and shut down my phone. My screen froze then went black. I couldn’t open or turn on my phone for hours! I think this app hacked my phone. This app is dangerous, take down this app!!
attributes.title: Worst app ever created

attributes.review:
hey upper east siders just letting you know that this app is awful. not only does it false information but also crashed several times. apple should take this app of the app store right now  so no one else has to deal with this atrocious dirty arby’s bag of an app. i’ll be waiting 
xoxo gossip girl
attributes.title: horrible app VERY disappointed

attributes.review: Crashed 20 times a day tried to screen record without my consent i didn’t like the controls really glitchy the graphics were terrible Ive had full WiFi and internet yet it still tries to say I don’t it keep send me notifications EVEN ONCE I TURNED IT OFF I HAVE NEVER HAD AN APP DO THIS. I HAVE NEVER HAD AND APP THIS TERRIBLE. THE PROGRAMMING IS BAD. 0/10
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review:
Uhm. This app is SCARY,😭 please don’t download it..there’s a weird Oompa Loompa 🧚🏻 on screen, he has a MUSTACHE- YES. A MUSTACHE. 😳 uhfahueheh, also here’s some information. 🥳
I was a girl in the village doing alright 😎
Then I became a princess overnight😗
Now I gotta figure out how to do it right😌
So much to learn and see😦
Up in the castle with my new family👨‍👩‍👧‍👦
In a school that's just for royalty👗
A whole enchanted world is waiting for me🙈
I'm so excited to be (Sofia the First)❤️
I'm finding out what being royal's all about 😇(Sofia the First)🧚🏻
Making my way, it's an adventure every day 🥳 anyways~ wear a seatbelt.
attributes.title: OOMPA LOOMPA 🙈

attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP!! I downloaded it and my phone started glitches as soon as I opened it. So annoying, and now my phone has a virus. The Trump team really needs to fix this and probably just take the app off the market before they get into legal issues for giving phones a virus!!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: I was trying to get updates on the campaign, but as soon as I clicked on the app, it tracked my IP address and multiple people in black grabbed me from my home and made me listen to several Trump speeches and then proceeded to make me do surveys on why Trumps the best. The trump campaign and his app are getting one star from me!
attributes.title: Horrible!!!
